title: UI/UX Design
description: User-centered design with wireframes, prototypes, and pixel-perfect interfaces that convert visitors into customers.

title: Website Redesign
description: Transform your outdated website into a modern, fast, and conversion-focused experience.

title: WordPress Development
description: Custom WordPress sites with premium themes, plugins, and SEO optimization. Perfect for blogs, portfolios, and small businesses.

title: Full Stack Web Apps
description: Complete MERN stack applications with authentication, databases, and cloud deployment on AWS.

title: AI Integration & Chatbots
description: Integrate ChatGPT, Claude, or custom AI models into your website. Smart chatbots, content generation, and automation.

title: Real-time Features
description: WebSocket integration for live chat, notifications, collaborative editing, and real-time data updates.

title: E-commerce Solutions
description: Online stores with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboards.

title: Third-party API Integration
description: Seamless integration with Google Maps, social media APIs, analytics, CRM systems, and more.

title: Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
description: Installable web apps that work offline, send push notifications, and feel like native mobile apps.

title: Website Maintenance
description: Monthly maintenance packages including updates, backups, security monitoring, and performance optimization.

title: No-Code Automation
description: Zapier, Make.com workflows to automate business processes, data sync, and integrations.

title: Custom Dashboards
description: Interactive data visualization dashboards with real-time updates and analytics.
